column5: Built in 1953 A little less than 1 mile from AT&T Stadium and the Globe Life Ballpark and about 2.5 miles from Six Flags and Hurricane Harbor you're right where you need to be for the big game and a great time with the family. Directly behind the house you will find Meadowbrook Park and 9 hole Municipal Golf Course. Large lighted backyard with plenty of patio furniture to relax and have a nice barbecue, plenty of shade in the summer and a nice fire pit in winter with firewood.
column8: Comfortable home, large yard, close to stadiums.
